## Evidence

### Checklist
- [ ] Description clearly explains the change
- [ ] Linked related issue with `Closes #` (if any)
- [ ] Resolved any merge conflicts
- [ ] All code compiles without errors (`javac *.java`)

### Testing
- [ ] Ran the Menu.java file to verify output
- [ ] New menu items display correctly with prices

## Suggested Review Focus

<!-- What should reviewers pay attention to? -->
- Check that commit messages are descriptive
- Verify menu items follow the format: "Item Name - $X.XX"
- Ensure prices are reasonable (under $15)
